metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10024 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the function Splash::scaleImageYuXu at Splash.cc for y Bresenham parameters.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 pfsmorigo> since there is not public repository, just a tarball, I analised the file in question (Splash.cc) with the affected version and they seems the same mdeslaur> in poppler, this was known as CVE-2017-14520

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
